I regret to inform you that you have not been selected for appointment to the post of Valuation Officer Trainee.

However, your name has been placed on a waiting list which will be valid up to 15 July 2019 or until such time as it is decided that a general recruitment should take place before that date, in which case the waiting list will lapse.

As appointments may be made from the waiting list to vacancies arising during its validity period, please keep us informed of any change of your address if you wish to be considered for such vacancies.

When the next general recruitment takes place, vacancies will be advertised. If at that time you are still interested, you should submit a fresh application, since, as indicated above, the general recruitment exercise will supersede the waiting list in question and candidates whose names have been placed on that list will not be accorded priority or preference over new applicants.

I regret to inform you that you have not been selected for appointment to the post of Valuation Officer Trainee.

However, your name has been placed on a waiting list which will be valid up to 15 July 2019 or until such time as it is decided that a general recruitment should take place before that date, in which case the waiting list will lapse.

As appointments may be made from the waiting list to vacancies arising during its validity period, please keep us informed of any change of your address if you wish to be considered for such vacancies.

When the next general recruitment takes place, vacancies will be advertised. If at that time you are still interested, you should submit a fresh application, since, as indicated above, the general recruitment exercise will supersede the waiting list in question and candidates whose names have been placed on that list will not be accorded priority or preference over new applicants.

I regret to inform you that you have not been selected for appointment to the post of Valuation Officer Trainee.

However, your name has been placed on a waiting list which will be valid up to 15 July 2019 or until such time as it is decided that a general recruitment should take place before that date, in which case the waiting list will lapse.

As appointments may be made from the waiting list to vacancies arising during its validity period, please keep us informed of any change of your address if you wish to be considered for such vacancies.

When the next general recruitment takes place, vacancies will be advertised. If at that time you are still interested, you should submit a fresh application, since, as indicated above, the general recruitment exercise will supersede the waiting list in question and candidates whose names have been placed on that list will not be accorded priority or preference over new applicants.
